page.description: Returns the matched portion of a string.
page.syntax: Output_String as C = SMATCH_TO(C string_1,C pattern)

argument.name: string_1
argument.description: The character string to examine for an occurrence of input string.

page.discussion: SMATCH_TO() returns everything to the left of and including the matched portion of a string.
page.example: dim st as C st = "Alpha Software" smatch_to(st, "*Soft*") -> "Alpha Soft" smatch_to(st, "*Soft? ") -> "Alpha Softw" smatch_to(st, "*Software*") -> "Alpha Software"
